t: Amazon.com : Coleman SupportRest Plus PillowStop Double-High Airbed, Built-in 120V Pump, Secure Pillow, Suitable for Camping & Home Use : Sports & Outdoors
s: This is my second Coleman brand air mattress and I love them. This one in particular is sturdy and quite comfortable. I blew it up a week before my family came to stay and it was still good when they arrived and after 1 person sleeping on it for a week, we only needed to add a little air to it once (just due to stretch). It's tall enough that it's easy to get out of and the edges keep your pillow ...
